title: Koji Mukai
text:
Koji Mukai (Japanese: 向井康二, Hepburn: Mukai Kōji, born June 21, 1994), is a Japanese singer, tarento, and actor. He is a member of the Japanese boy band Snow Man.


== Biography ==
Koji Mukai was born on June 21, 1994, in Thailand,  to a Thai mother and Japanese father. Shortly after his birth, his family moved to Nara Prefecture, Japan, and was subsequently raised there.
